segments.text: I am trying to see if I can afford to purchase a home that I wish to buy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can figure that out right now . How much do you earn annually ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My wife and I earned one hundred and fifty thousand dollars last year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many years have you held your current position ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been at my current job for 10 years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there any extra income that you receive other than salary ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I collect one thousand dollars a month from a rental property .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever figured out your credit score ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I try not to think about it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Adding in your expenses , I calculate that you can spend three hundred thousand on a house .
segments.speaker: S2
